  • Constructor Details

    • ItkRegistration

      public ItkRegistration()
      Medium level functions : constructor, and managers algorithms. The Manager Handling should follow this order (see below in the commentary) In the order : call the constructor setMovingImage(ijImgMov); setReferenceImage(ijImgMov); setMetric(MetricType metricType) (eventually) setCapillaryHandlingOn addStepToQueue( ... ) addStepToQueue( ... ) addStepToQueue( ... ) register(); ImagePlus resultat=computeRegisteredImage();
